artist: Artist: Ogata Gekkō; Publisher: Takekawa Risaburō
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; triptych forming a single image; violent battle scene; two large black cannons firing in center sheet; cannons surrounded by large plume of white smoke; two burning ships on a body of water on left sheet; soldiers in black uniforms storming a stone wall in left sheet, attacking soldiers in colorful uniforms; banner of text in Japanese characters across center image in top center; raid continues on right image, with soldiers in black uniforms running up a sloped incline, with a single house in URQ on right sheet
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Sino-Japanese War (Nisshin sensō 日清戰争)
title: Picture of the Taking of the Battery at Lüshun Port
